name: Attention Shoppers
description:
Attention Shoppers is a top-down Arcade Horror game with a grocery store twist where you must complete your shopping list and make it back to the register alive.Featuring:

- 5 levels
- Retro graphics
- Royalty-free music
- High Scores
- Brand-related puns
- Victory   GROCERIES!

How to play:

Keyboard:
Z: Select / Accelerate
X: Back / Brakes
C: Open Shopping List
Left Arrow: Turn Left
Right Arrow: Turn Right
F2: Toggle Fullscreen
HOME: Return to Main Menu
(Menus support mouse input)

Gamepad:
See Gamepad Layout screenshot for controls
